home.title: Bogga Hore
home.description: Nabad iyo barako ha kula jirto mar walba
home.dailyReminder0: Run ahaantii abuuridda samooyinka iyo dhulka iyo is‚Äërogrogga habeenka iyo maalinta waxaa ku jira calaamado u ah kuwa garashada leh.
home.dailyReminder2: Sameeya khayr; Ilaahay wuxuu jecel yahay kuwa khayr sameeya.
home.dailyReminder3: I xusuusta, aniguna waan idin xusuusan. Ii mahadnaqa, hana iga gaaloobin.
home.dailyReminder4: Dhibaato kasta waxaa la socota fudayd. Marka aad dhammayso, u istaag cibaado, una jeedso Rabigaaga.
home.dailyReminder5: Kuwa rumeeyeyow! Marka loogu yeedho salaadda Jimcaha, u orda xuska Ilaahay oo ka taga ganacsiga.
home.dailyReminder6: Ka dambi dhaaf weydiista Rabigiinna dabadeedna u toobad keena. Rabbigay waa Naxariis badan, Jecel.

privacyPolicy.title: Siyaasadda Asturnaanta
privacyPolicy.content:
Barakah Furqan waxay ixtiraamtaa asturnaantaada. Siyaasaddu waxay sharxaysaa xogta iyo oggolaanshaha loo isticmaalo si loo bixiyo adeegyada app‚Äëka.

Xog/oggolaansho la isticmaalo:
‚Ä¢ Goobta si loo helo jihada Qibla iyo waqtiga salaadda.
‚Ä¢ Makarafoon si loogu tababarto tilawa.
‚Ä¢ Internet si loo helo waqtiga salaadda iyo xogta Qur'aanka.
‚Ä¢ Aqoonsiga hadalka onlayn si loo falanqeeyo tilawa.

Sida xogta loo isticmaalo:
‚Ä¢ In lagu shaqaysiiyo adeegyada muhiimka ah ee qalabkaaga.
‚Ä¢ In lagu wanaajiyo kalsoonida app‚Äëka iyo taageerada.

Wadaagista xogta:
‚Ä¢ Ma iibinno xogtaada.
‚Ä¢ Qaar ka mid ah adeegyada (sida waqtiga salaadda iyo aqoonsiga hadalka) waxay isticmaalaan adeegyo dhinac‚Äësaddexaad ah oo xogta u farsameeya sida siyaasaddooda.

Amniga:
‚Ä¢ Waxaan qaadnaa tillaabooyin macquul ah si aan u ilaalinno xogtaada.

Asturnaanta carruurta:
‚Ä¢ App‚Äëku wuxuu u yahay dhammaan dadka, mana ururiyo xogta gaarka ah ee carruurta si ula kac ah.

Xiriir:
‚Ä¢ Email: dgirsandi@gmail.com

about.title: Ku saabsan
about.description: Barakah Furqan waxaa loogu talagalay inay kaa caawiso akhrinta, fahamka, iyo ku‚Äëtababarka Qur'aanka iyadoo la haysto taageero ruuxi ah maalin kasta.
about.dataIntro: App‚Äëkani wuxuu isticmaalaa xog/adeegyo si loo shaqaysiiyo astaamaha muhiimka ah:
about.dataLocation: Helitaanka goobta si loo helo jihada Qibla iyo waqtiga salaadda.
about.dataMicrophone: Helitaanka makarafoonka si loogu tababarto tilawa.
about.dataInternet: Internet si loo helo waqtiga salaadda iyo xogta Qur'aanka.
about.dataSpeech: Aqoonsiga hadalka onlayn si loo falanqeeyo tilawa.
about.notes: Oggolaanshadu waxay u isticmaalaan keliya bixinta adeegyada app‚Äëka ee qalabkaaga.

donation.title: Deeq
donation.description: Waxaad ku deeqi kartaa adigoo adeegsanaya linkiga hoose ama adigoo sawiraya QR.
donation.qrHint: Sawir QR‚Äëkan si aad u deeqdo
donation.disclaimer: Deeqaha waxaa loo isticmaali doonaa horumarinta Barakah Furqan, 10%‚Äëna waxaa loo diri doonaa agoonta.

kiblat.title: Jihada Qibla
kiblat.description: Soo hel jihada saxda ah ee Kaaba
kiblat.errorDescription: App‚Äëku wuxuu u baahan yahay oggolaanshaha goobta iyo dareemaha compass‚Äëka si uu u muujiyo jihada Qibla
kiblat.calibrating: Compass‚Äëka waa la hagaajinayaa... qalabka u dhaqaaji qaab 8
kiblat.instruction: U jeedi qalabka adigoo raacaya astaanta masjidka (cagaaran) ee compass‚Äëka. Rog qalabka ilaa astaantu xasisho oo la jaanqaado jihada ka muuqata kaarka kore.
kiblat.locationPermissionDesc: Loo baahan yahay si loo xisaabiyo jihada Qibla ee goobtaada
kiblat.locationPermissionRequired: Oggolaanshaha goobta waa loo baahan yahay
kiblat.locationPermissionRequiredDesc: App‚Äëku wuxuu u baahan yahay oggolaanshaha goobta si uu u xisaabiyo jihada Qibla. Fadlan ka daar dejinta.

shalat.title: Waqtiga Salaadda
shalat.notificationDesc: I xasuusi marka waqtiga salaaddu yimaado
shalat.sahurReminder: Xasuusin sahuur inta lagu jiro Ramadaan
shalat.locationPermissionDesc: Loo baahan yahay si loo xisaabiyo waqtiga salaadda ee goobtaada
shalat.internetConnectionDesc: Loo baahan yahay si loo helo jadwalka salaadda server‚Äëka
shalat.usingCacheDesc: Jadwalka salaadda waxaa laga soo bandhigayaa kaydka. Cusboonaysii si aad u hesho xog cusub.
shalat.locationPermissionRequired: Oggolaanshaha goobta waa loo baahan yahay
shalat.locationPermissionRequiredDesc: App‚Äëku wuxuu u baahan yahay oggolaanshaha goobta si uu u xisaabiyo waqtiga salaadda. Fadlan ka daar dejinta.
shalat.adhanError: Ma suurtagelin in adhaan la ciyaaro
shalat.notificationError: Ma suurtagelin in ogeysiiska tijaabada la diro
shalat.testNotificationDesc: Ogeysiiska tijaabada wuxuu soo bixi doonaa 2 ilbiriqsi gudahood!

tilawah.title: Tilawa
tilawah.permissionRequired: Oggolaanshaha makarafoonka waa loo baahan yahay
tilawah.permissionRequiredDesc: Helitaanka makarafoonka ayaa loo baahan yahay si loo dhageysto akhrintaada.
tilawah.microphonePermissionDesc: Loo baahan yahay si loo dhageysto akhrintaada
tilawah.step3: 3. Dhegeyso oo akhri jumlada oo dhan
tilawah.micTestDesc: Riix bilow oo hadal. Qoraalka ugu dambeeyay ee la ogaaday ayaa halkan muuqanaya.
tilawah.micTestEmpty: Weli wax hadal ah lama oga.
tilawah.micTestStopSession: Jooji fadhiga tilawa ka hor tijaabada makarafoonka.
tilawah.reciteSentenceDesc: Si dabiici ah u akhri adigoon kala goyn erayada.
tilawah.enterTextFirst: Fadlan marka hore geli qoraalka Qur'aanka
tilawah.tipsDescription:
‚Ä¢ Isticmaal deegaan degan
‚Ä¢ Si cad u akhri adigoo tajweed leh
‚Ä¢ Ku akhri hal socod
‚Ä¢ Aqoonsiga hadalka wuxuu shaqeeyaa onlayn
